words.id: maka hadapkan||wajahmu||kepada agama||yang lurus||dari||sebelum||bahwa||akan datang||suatu hari||tidak||dapat menolak||baginya||dari||Allah||pada hari itu||mereka terpisah-pisah
words.en: So set||your face||to the religion||right||before||before||[that]||comes||a Day||not||(can be) averted||[it]||from||Allah||That Day||they will be divided

translations.text: Fa-aqim wajhaka lid-deenil qaiyyimi min qabli aien yaatiya Yawmul laa maradda lahoo minal laahi Yawma'izien yassadda'oon

words.id: barangsiapa||kafir||maka atasnya||kekafirannya||dan barangsiapa||beramal||kebajikan/saleh||maka untuk diri mereka sendiri||mereka menyiapkan
words.en: Whoever||disbelieves||then against him||(is) his disbelief||And whoever||does||righteousness||then for themselves||they are preparing

translations.text: Man kafara fa'alaihi kufruhoo Wa-man amila saalihan fali-anfusihim yamhadoon

words.id: karena Dia akan memberi balasan||orang-orang yang||beriman||dan mereka beramal||kebajikan/saleh||dari||karunia-Nya||sesungguhnya Dia||tidak||Dia menyukai||orang-orang yang kafir
words.en: That He may reward||those who||believe||and do||righteous deeds||(out) of||His Bounty||Indeed He||(does) not||like||the disbelievers

translations.text: Li-yajziyal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati min fadlih; innahoo laa yuhibbul kaafireen

words.id: dan diantara||ayat-ayat-Nya||bahwa||Dia mengirimkan||angin||pembawa berita gembira||dan untuk merasakan kepadamu||dari||rahmat-Nya||dan supaya berlayar||perahu||dengan perintah-Nya||dan supaya kamu mencari||dari||karunia-Nya||dan agar kamu||kalian bersyukur
words.en: And among||His Signs||(is) that||He sends||the winds||(as) bearers of glad tidings||and to let you taste||of||His Mercy||and that may sail||the ships||at His Command||and that you may seek||of||His Bounty||and that you may||be grateful

translations.text: Wa-min Aayaatiheee aien yursilar riyaaha mubashshi-raatinw Wa-li-yuzeeqakum mir rahmatihee Wa-litajriyal fulku bi-amrihee Wa-litabtaghoo min fadlihee Wa-la'allakum tashkuroon

words.id: dan sesungguhnya||Kami telah mengutus||dari||sebelum kamu||para Rasul||kepada||kaum mereka||maka (Rasul) datang kepada mereka||dengan keterangan-keterangan||lalu Kami menyiksa||dari||orang-orang yang||(mereka) berdosa||dan adalah||berhak/berkewajiban||atas kami||pertolongan||orang-orang yang beriman
words.en: And verily||We sent||before you||before you||Messengers||to||their people||and they came to them||with clear proofs||then We took retribution||from||those who||committed crimes||And it was||incumbent||upon Us||(to) help||the believers

translations.text: Wa-laqad arsalnaa min qablika Rusulan ilaa qawmihim fajaaa'oohum bil-baiyyinaati fantaqamnaa minal lazeena ajramoo Wa-kaana haqqan alainaa nasrul mu'mineen

words.id: Allah||yang||mengirimkan||angin||lalu (angin) menghalau||awan||lalu membentangkannya||di||langit||bagaimana menurut||Dia kehendaki||dan Dia menjadikannya||gumpalan-gumpalan||maka kamu melihat||hujan||keluar||dari||celah-celahnya||maka apabila||mengenai||dengannya||siapa||Dia kehendaki||daripada||hamba-hamba-Nya||tiba-tiba||mereka||mereka bergembira
words.en: Allah||(is) the One Who||sends||the winds||so they raise||(the) clouds||then He spreads them||in||the sky||how||He wills||and He makes them||fragments||so you see||the rain||coming forth||from||their midst||Then when||He causes it to fall on||He causes it to fall on||whom||He wills||of||His slaves||behold||They||rejoice

translations.text: Allaahul lazee yursilur riyaaha fatuseeru sahaaban fa-yabsutuhoo fis samaaa'i kaifa yashaaa'u Wa-yaj'aluhoo kisafan fataral wadqa yakhruju min khilaalihee fa-izaaa asaaba bihee mai yashaaa'u min ibaadiheee izaa hum yastabshiroon

words.id: dan sesungguhnya||adalah mereka||dari||sebelum||bahwa||diturunkan||atas mereka||dari||sebelumnya||benar-benar berputus asa
words.en: And certainly||they were||before||before||[that]||it was sent down||upon them||[before it]||[before it]||surely in despair

translations.text: Wa-in kaanoo min qabli aien yunazzala alaihim min qablihee lamubliseen

words.id: maka perhatikanlah||kepada||bekas-bekas||rahmat||Allah||bagaimana||Dia menghidupkan||bumi||sesudah||matinya||sesungguhnya||yang demikian||benar-benar menghidupkan||orang mati||dan Dia||atas||segala||sesuatu||Maha Kuasa
words.en: So look||at||(the) effects||(of the) Mercy||(of) Allah||how||He gives life||(to) the earth||after||its death||Indeed||that||surely He (will) give life||(to) the dead||And He||(is) on||every||thing||All-Powerful

translations.text: Fanzur ilaaa aasaari rahmatil laahi kaifa yuhyil arda ba'da mawtihaa; inna zaalika lamuhyil mawtaa Wa-Huwa 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

words.id: dan sungguh jika||Kami mengirimkan||angin||maka mereka melihatnya||menjadi kuning||niscaya mereka tetap||dari||sesudahnya/itu||mereka ingkar
words.en: But if||We sent||a wind||and they see it||turn yellow||certainly they continue||after it||after it||(in) disbelief

translations.text: Wa-la'in arsalnaa reehan fara-awhu musfarral lazalloo mim ba'dihee yakfuroon

words.id: maka sesungguhnya kamu||kamu tidak||dapat menjadikan mendengar||orang mati||dan tidak||kamu menjadikan mendengar||orang tuli||seruan||apabila||mereka berpaling||membelakang
words.en: So indeed, you||(can) not||make the dead hear||make the dead hear||and not||make the deaf hear||make the deaf hear||the call||when||they turn||retreating

translations.text: Fa-innaka laa tusmi'ul mawtaa Wa-laa tusmi'us summad du'aaa'a izaa wallaw mudbireen

words.id: dan tidaklah||kamu||dengan memberi petunjuk||orang yang buta||dari||kesesatan mereka||tidaklah||kamu menjadikan mendengar||kecuali||orang||dia beriman||dengan ayat-ayat Kami||maka mereka||orang-orang yang berserah diri
words.en: And not||you||can guide||the blind||from||their error||Not||you can make hear||except||(those) who||believe||in Our Verses||so they||surrender

translations.text: Wa-maa anta bihaadil umyi 'an dalaalatihim in tusmi'u illaa maien yuminu bi-aayaatinaa fahum muslimoon

words.id: Allah||yang||menciptakan kalian||dari||keadaan lemah||kemudian||Dia menjadikan||dari||sesudah||keadaan lemah||kuat||kemudian||Dia menjadikan||dari||sesudah||kuat||keadaan lemah||dan beruban||Dia menciptakan||apa||yang dikehendaki-Nya||Dan dia||Maha Mengetahui||Maha Kuasa
words.en: Allah||(is) the One Who||created you||from||weakness||then||made||after||after||weakness||strength||then||made||after||after||strength||weakness||and gray hair||He creates||what||He wills||and He||(is) the All-Knower||the All-Powerful

translations.text: Allahul lazee khalaqa-kum min du'fin summa ja'ala mim ba'di du'fin quwwatan summa ja'ala mim ba'di quwwatin du'fanw Wa-shaibah; yakhluqu maa yashaaa'u Wa-Huwal 'Aleemul Qadeer

words.id: dan pada hari||terjadi||kiamat||bersumpah||orang-orang yang berdosa||tidaklah||mereka tinggal||melainkan||sesaat||seperti demikianlah||adalah mereka||mereka dipalingkan
words.en: And (the) Day||will (be) established||the Hour||will swear||the criminals||not||they remained||but||an hour||Thus||they were||deluded

translations.text: Wa-Yawma taqoomus Saa'atu yuqsimul mujrimoona maa labisoo ghaira saa'ah; kazaalika kaanoo yu'fakoon

words.id: dan berkata||orang-orang yang||(mereka) diberi||ilmu pengetahuan||dan keimanan||sesungguhnya||kamu telah tinggal||dalam/menurut||ketetapan||Allah||sampai||hari||berbangkit||maka ini||hari||berbangkit||akan tetapi kamu||kalian adalah||tidak||(kalian) mengetahui
words.en: But will say||those who||were given||the knowledge||and the faith||Verily||you remained||by||(the) Decree||(of) Allah||until||(the) Day||(of) Resurrection||And this||(is the) Day||(of) the Resurrection||but you||were||not||knowing

translations.text: Wa-qaalal lazeena ootul ilma wal-eemaana laqad labistum fee kitaabil laahi ilaa yawmil ba'si fahaazaa yawmul ba'si Wa-laakinnakum kuntum laa ta'lamoon

words.id: maka pada hari itu||tidak||bermanfaat||orang-orang yang||(mereka) zalim||permintaan uzur mereka||dan tidak||mereka||mereka diberi kesempatan bertaubat
words.en: So that Day||not||will profit||those who||wronged||their excuses||and not||they||will be allowed to make amends

translations.text: Fa-Yawma'izil laa yanfa'ul lazeena zalamoo ma'ziratu-hum Wa-laa hum yusta'taboon

words.id: dan sesungguhnya||Kami telah membuat||untuk manusia||dalam||ini||Al-Qur'an||dari||segala||perumpamaan||dan sungguh jika||kamu datang pada mereka||dengan suatu ayat||pasti akan berkata||orang-orang yang||kafir/ingkar||tidaklah||kamu||kecuali||orang-orang yang membuat kepalsuan
words.en: And verily||We (have) set forth||for mankind||in||this||[the] Quran||of||every||example||But if||you bring them||a sign||surely will say||those who||disbelieve||Not||you||(are) except||falsifiers

translations.text: Wa-laqad darabnaa linnaasi fee haazal Quraani min kulli masal; Wa-la'in ji'tahum bi-aayatil la-yaqoolannal lazeena kafaroo in antum illaa mubtiloon

words.id: seperti demikian||mengunci mati/mencap||Allah||atas||hati-hati||orang-orang yang||(mereka) tidak||mengetahui/memahami
words.en: Thus||Allah seals||Allah seals||[on]||(the) hearts||(of) those who||(do) not||know

translations.text: Kazaalika yatba'ul laahu 'alaa quloobil lazeena laa ya'lamoon

words.id: maka bersabarlah kamu||sesungguhnya||janji||Allah||hak/benar||dan jangan||sekali-kali menggelisahkan kamu||orang-orang yang||(mereka) tidak||meyakini
words.en: So be patient||Indeed||(the) Promise||(of) Allah||(is) true||And (let) not||take you in light estimation||those who||(are) not||certain in faith

translations.text: Fasbir inna wa'dal laahi haqqunw Wa-laa yastakhif-fannakal lazeena laa yooqinoon
